markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Codebreaker's Parchment](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1049)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 182 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This finely crafted, seemingly mundane parchment is useful for writing sensitive documents. When words are written on this parchment, they instantly scramble into unrecognizable script, requiring a DC 20 check to [Decipher Writing](/Actions.aspx?ID=22).

<document level="2" id="action-837" />

<document level="2" id="action-838" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</column>

level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Codebreaker's Parchment (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 182 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The DC to Decipher Writing is 30 and requires master proficiency.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Codebreaker's Parchment (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 182 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 14,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The DC to Decipher Writing is 40 and requires legendary proficiency.
name: Codebreaker's Parchment
